    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DewInterpreter.DewLexer getInstance()
        Get the instance of the lang lexer
        Returns:
        lang lexer instance

      • tokenize

        @Deprecated
public java.util.Stack tokenize(java.io.File file)
                         throws DewInterpreter.DewException
        Deprecated. 
        Tokenizes a lang script. Tokenization is the interpreter frontend to the parser backend. This method will create tokens, each of which is a usable fraction of the script. These tokens can then be analyzed by the parser to assemble a syntax tree, which can be interpreted and run. This method is generally handled within the lang interpreter.
        Parameters:
        file - source
        Returns:
        the stack of tokens, flipped
        Throws:
        DewInterpreter.DewException

      • tokenizeAcc

        public java.util.Stack tokenizeAcc(java.io.File file)
                            throws DewInterpreter.DewException
        Tokenizes a lang script. Tokenization is the interpreter frontend to the parser backend. This method will create tokens, each of which is a usable fraction of the script. These tokens can then be analyzed by the parser to assemble a syntax tree, which can be interpreted and run. This method is generally handled within the lang interpreter.
        Parameters:
        file - source
        Returns:
        the stack of tokens, flipped
        Throws:
        DewInterpreter.DewException

      • pushCharacterSequence

        private long pushCharacterSequence(java.util.Stack stack,
                         java.lang.StringBuilder dataLiteral,
                         boolean isInStringLiteral,
                         long tokensTokenized,
                         int lineNum,
                         int charInLineNum,
                         long scriptCharNum)
        This method tokenizes character sequence literals after generic symbols and syntax have been tokenized
        Parameters:
        stack - the stack to push evaluated character sequences
        dataLiteral - the character sequence to be analyzed
        isInStringLiteral - is the character sequence a part of a denoted string literal
